name: Magnets in Space
description:
Use the power of magnets to bring peace to space.  

WASD to move, LMB to shoot metal bullets, F to change the polarity of your ship.

Notes:

  • I was busy this week, so there are no enemies, win/lose conditions, or sound.
  • Sometimes the polarity on your ship pulls to bullets back at you.

Global Game Jam 22
